messages.subject: Class Dismissed movie about homeschooling/unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: A fellow homeschooling dad is helping to co-produce this film. Please share among other homeschoolers!! Very exciting!! I m co-producing the first full-length
messages.messageBody:
A fellow homeschooling dad is helping to co-produce this film. Please share among other homeschoolers!! Very exciting!!

"I'm co-producing the first full-length feature film on homeschooling with a senior editor for Lucas Films and could use your support!"

Here's our fundraising campaign: http://www.indiegogo.com/Class-Dismissed-Fund

The entire crew is composed of homeschool parents who work in the film industry who want to raise the public awareness of homeschooling & dispel many of the myths that surround homeschooling.

For more background on the film, visit http://www.homeschoolfilm.com/

Any financial or promotional support (Facebook, other homeschool groups, etc) you could offer would be greatly appreciated.
